original_text: Judah replied, ‘I will take a young goat from my animals and I will give it to you.’ Tamar said, ‘Please give me something now to show me that you will really send the goat to me.’
korean_text: 유다가 이르되 내가 내 떼에서 염소 새끼를 주리라 그가 이르되 당신이 그것을 줄 때까지 담보물을 주겠느냐

sentences.original_text: I will take a young goat from my animals
sentences.korean_translation: 내 짐승 중에서 염소 새끼 하나를 가져오겠습니다

sentences.original_text: and I will give it to you
to show me that you will really send the goat to me
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 정말로 염소를 보내주실 것이라는 증거로
